What are Napoletana pizzas? A rare class of artisan pizza typically made exclusively in Italy. Pizza lovers, rejoice! In addition to pizza, wings, calzones, salads, and Italian desserts, this location has the younger sister of our award winning craft cocktail bar, Sidecar, nestled inside the dining room!V Pizza specializes in the art of traditional Napoletana pizza making.
